QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Heartburn - what to ask your doctor
QAPair.Answer: You have gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD). This condition causes food or stomach acid to come back into your esophagus from your stomach. This process is called esophageal reflux. It can cause heartburn, chest pain, cough, or hoarseness. Below are questions you may want to ask your health care provider to help you take care of your heartburn and reflux.
